name: powermode-plus
description: Your code is powerful, unleash it!
author: jinghaihan

powermode.presets.description: Choose between different preset gifs to use when powermode is activated

enumDescriptions: Show the combo in the editor. The true 'Power Mode' experience
Use the status bar. A more subdued experience.
Use the default value. May be override by other settings.
powermode.combo.location.description: Control where all the combo information is visible.

powermode.combo.threshold.description: The combo number needed to activate POWER MODE!!! and start shaking and exploding the screen! If the value is 0, POWER MODE will always be active.

powermode.combo.timeout.description: The number of seconds before the combo resets. If the value is 0, the timer will never reset.

enumDescriptions: Use the default value. May be overridden by other settings.
powermode.combo.counterEnabled.description: Control whether the combo counter is visible.

powermode.combo.counterSize.description: Control the size of the Combo Meter text

enumDescriptions: Use the default value. May be overridden by other settings.
powermode.combo.timerEnabled.description: Control whether the combo timer is visible.

powermode.combo.customCss.description: Set custom CSS that will apply to the combo element.

powermode.shake.enabled.description: Set to false to disable shaking while typing

powermode.shake.intensity.description: The intensity with which the screen shakes

powermode.explosions.enabled.description: Set to false to disable explosions while typing

powermode.explosions.maxExplosions.description: The maximum number of simultaneous explosions

powermode.explosions.size.description: The size of the explosions. For value X, the height is set to X rem and the width to X ch

powermode.explosions.frequency.description: The number of key strokes needed to trigger an explosion. 2 means every second keystroke will explode, 1 means every key stroke.

powermode.explosions.offset.description: The vertical offset of the explosions. Increasing it will move the explosions up, decreasing it will move them down.

powermode.explosions.customExplosions.markdownDescription: This value will go into the 'url()' part of a background image. It should be a base64 encoded gif or **https** URL _without_ quotes.

enumDescriptions: Uses the gifs as a mask to let the background color come through (similar to atom power mode)
powermode.explosions.backgroundMode.description: Affects the css properties used to display the gif.

enumDescriptions: Resume playing it from its previous point
Restart the gif each time it is shown. This is useful when you have multiple visible gifs, but may reduce performance
powermode.explosions.gifMode.description: Control the 'playback' mode of the gifs.

powermode.explosions.explosionOrder.description: Determines how the explosions are cycled. 'random' (default) picks from the list randomly. 'sequential' goes through the list in order, and a number will select the explosion at that (zero based)index in the list

powermode.explosions.duration.description: Determines how long an explosion lasts (in milliseconds). Set to 0 for it to last forever.

powermode.explosions.customCss.description: Set custom CSS that will apply to the explosion element.
